name: Push to Shove
description:
Use A and D to move left and Right, and W to jump. Interact with the environment to reach the flag!

(To get to the next level, use the 1, 2, or 3 keys).

Character sprite by Goldmetal:  https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/simple-2d-platformer-assets-...

Background sprites by Pixel Frog: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/pixel-adventure-1-155360
